name: Music Paper
description:
MUSIC PAPER

Guide the paper airplane through the obstacles

HOW TO PLAY:

touch the screensides or tilt your smartphone to move the plane.

Follow me on twitter: https://twitter.com/matheuspb95

CREDITS

This game was made for Global Game Jam 2017, with partneship with flameseed productions (https://www.facebook.com/flameseedproductions).
